name: Slimane Azem
description: '''Slimane Azem''' (September 19, 1918 â€“ January 31, 1983) was an [[Algerian people|Algerian]] singer and poet, born in [[Agouni Gueghrane]] (kabylie region),that composed hundreds of songs in more than 40 years of artistic life. A great admirer of the poet [[Si Mohand]], Slimane Azem included in his songs different [[Asefru|isefra]] (traditional poetry) by this author.
